attributes.action: set a maximum time of 2 years to any one contract for contract workers before being made perminent by the company
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many people who work for employment agencies work for long periods sometimes even years on one contract. The main problem with this is there is no security in a "temp" job and there for have problems or at the least worries about making big monetery decisions like morgages or loans. If there was a "top end" on the the lenght of a contract before it becomes perminent, or at the least a redundancy payment after 12 months to help with security.
